update class_wallet_draft
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

discriminator = #{discriminator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
course_title_id = #{courseTitleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

sundry_fees_id = #{sundryFeesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
sundry_fees = #{sundryFees,jdbcType=INT} ,
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
is_free = #{isFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

contract_term_id = #{contractTermId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
course_product_type_id = #{courseProductTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
previous_id = #{previousId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
